name: Superoffice
description:
An action demo of a game with bullets, time control and office bullshit.

Superoffice is an idea we are working now. This little demo has just 2 levels - it is a fast experience.

If you enjoyed playing it, found a bug or something you want to see in this game, please comment below. Any feedback is really appreciated.

To get more news and updates about Superoffice, please follow us at @GamesSeed.
